author: @completebhejafry
text: Hey! Great series of videos, I'm very grateful to you for putting this up.  One question: is the definition for context.fundamentals like a keyword or something?  Basically what I'm asking is that can I write something like this:  context.fundamentals_buy=get_fundamentals( put one bunch of conditions here) context.fundamentals_sell=get_fundamentals( put another bunch of conditions here)  So basically when i rebalance, I want to check if any stock in my portfolio is IN the buy, and not in the sell. When it shows up in the sell side, that's when I want to trigger a sale.   Is that possible?   Thanks! anees   PS: just gave it a try on Quantopian, but it didn't make any buys or sells. How can I share the code with you?
